name: Find
description: Search through an **Array** of [items](https://nordcraft.com) and apply a formula to each item, to return the first item where the provided formula returns True.

arguments.name: Formula
arguments.description: The **predicate** formula that each item in the array is passed to.

output.description: The **first** item in the Array where the formula returns True. Returns Null if the predicate formula did not return True for any item.
